definition: to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive

sentences.english: They were nearly four times as likely to live long after bypass surgery as were the unmarried.
sentences.chinese: 她们搭桥手术后的存活率几乎是未婚者的4倍。

sentences.english: Results The cell livability of continuous exposure chemotherapy group was significantly lower than that of the group from once exposure chemotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 结果持续给药组细胞存活率显著低于一次性给药组。

sentences.english: Both driver and passenger were given a survival chance of only 10%.
sentences.chinese: 司机和程控的存活率都只有10%。

sentences.english: In this condition the overwintering larva survived with very high percentage and became the first source in coming year.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下越冬幼虫存活率高，成为下一年的虫源。

sentences.english: Natural survival rate of eggs and the various instar larvae in different years were also investigated.
sentences.chinese: 并观察了不同年份棉铃虫卵和各龄幼虫的自然存活率。

sentences.english: Conclusion Gestational age is the major factor affecting the incidence and survival rate of NEC.
sentences.chinese: 结论胎龄是影响NEC发生率和存活率的重要因素。

sentences.english: The cell viability is recorded only with microscopic observation.
sentences.chinese: 细胞存活率只能以显微镜观察纪录下来。

sentences.english: Girding can improve the cuttings survival rate effectively, but no use to rooting rate.
sentences.chinese: 环剥能提高插条存活率，而不能促进生根。

sentences.english: Local control was good with an acceptable 2-year survival rate.
sentences.chinese: 局部控制结果很好，且两年存活率是可以接受的。

sentences.english: Infant-care behavior of cotton-top tamarin has a direct effect on infant mortality.
sentences.chinese: 笼养棉顶狨猴的育婴行为直接影响婴猴的存活率。

sentences.english: Aether has little influence on the cell livability.
sentences.chinese: 乙醚对细胞的存活率影响不大。

sentences.english: This inhibitor has also been shown to enhance survival during the transplantation of ES cell-derived neural precursors3.
sentences.chinese: 还能增强胚胎干细胞来源的神经细胞的抑制存活率。

sentences.english: The overall 5- and 10-year actuarial survival rates were 53% and 50% respectively.
sentences.chinese: 全部病人的五年及十年存活率分别为53%及50%。

sentences.english: Mental and physical exercise, for instance, both boost neuron survival.
sentences.chinese: 例如，脑力和体育锻炼都被认为能提升神经元存活率。

sentences.english: The team used relative survival ratio (RSR) as a measure of patient survival.
sentences.chinese: 研究团队将相对存活率作为病人生存的度量指标。

sentences.english: The plant survival rate with stone mulching was higher than with litter which was much higher than plastic mulch.
sentences.chinese: 石面覆盖存活率最高，其次是枯枝落叶覆盖。

definition: rate of infection (usu. of a disease)
